job.title: Data Science Analyst
job.description: pWe are a digitally native company where innovation design and engineering meet scale We use the latest technologies in the digital and cognitive field to empower organizations in every aspectppWe want you to join us to work for the biggest clients in tech retail travel banking ecommerce and media revolutionizing and growing their core businesses while helping them and you stay ahead of the curve Be part of a company with the most cuttingedge practices and technologies plus a unique teamppbrppWe are looking for a Sr strongData Science Analyst strongfor a strongfull timestrong position Ideally in Pacific or Central time zoneppbrppJob DescriptionppWe are seeking an experienced Sr Data Science Analyst to support the Adobe Spark and CC Education teams This role is a strategic role partnering with product managers and the leadership team making key decisions about the direction of our products Were looking for someone who has experience and passion about behavioral analysis for software productsppbrppWhat youll doppDeliver user insights and analysisppUse SQL to analyze data and create a deeper understanding of our users and their behaviorsppIdentify opportunities and advocate for product improvement and optimizationppBuild dashboards and tools that provide insight around key metricsppPresent findings to key leadership to influence product roadmapsppPerform ad hoc analysis and data modeling to understand and predict behavior trends in order to optimize growth and engagementppHelp our business make the right decisionsppPartner closely with teams to understand their business objectives and provide datadriven solutions and recommendationsppDefine the key business metrics to track the health of our business and drive better decision makingppEmphasize the value of dataanalytics and help drive a datainformed cultureppDrive our data platformppPartner directly with the product development teams on product instrumentation product flow and data captureppHelp drive the strategy and roadmap for dataanalytics tools and systemsppBecome the subject matter expert on our data platform including driving the requirements for our internal event logging systems data processing engines experimentation frameworks and data visualizationdashboard toolsppBuild trust in data by creating processes and frameworks that ensure data integrity and consistent data definitionsppbrppWhat you need to succeedppExtensive experience with SQLppExperience with data visualization tools such as Tableau PowerBIppProduct Sense Experience with software product behavior and funnel datappbrppWe are interested in hardworking fastlearning talents and we have the knowhow and scale to help you make your own career path If you seek an entrepreneurial flexible and teamoriented culture come join usppWe are readyp
